chart.title: Requests over Time
chart.searchString: eventtype=cisco-wsa-squid cs_username="$cs_username$" c_ip="$c_ip$" |timechart count as "# Requests" by action

chart.title: Bandwidth over Time
chart.searchString: eventtype=cisco-wsa-squid cs_username="$cs_username$" c_ip="$c_ip$" |eval bytes = bytes_in + bytes_out |timechart bins=60 per_second(bytes) by action

table.title: Top 10 Destination Domains
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-wsa-squid cs_username="$cs_username$" c_ip="$c_ip$" |top limit=10 dest_domain |rename dest_domain as "Destination"

table.title: IP Addresses in Use
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-wsa-squid cs_username="$cs_username$" c_ip="$c_ip$" |dedup consecutive=t c_ip |table _time,c_ip |rename c_ip as "Client IP"

table.title: Usernames in Use
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-wsa-squid cs_username="$cs_username$" c_ip="$c_ip$" |dedup consecutive=t cs_username |table _time,cs_username |rename cs_username AS "Username"

table.title: User Agents in Use
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-wsa-squid cs_username="$cs_username$" c_ip="$c_ip$" |top limit=10 cs_user_agent |rename cs_user_agent as "User Agent"

table.title: Top 10 Web Categories
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-wsa-squid cs_username="$cs_username$" c_ip="$c_ip$" |eval Category=if(match(x_webcat_code_abbr,"C_.*"),"[CUSTOM] " + x_webcat_code_full, x_webcat_code_full) |top limit=10 Category
